          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="nl">Count</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">This software permits children to work at the concept of number and quantities. The system randomly chooses and writes how many objects have to be inserted into the Venn diagram. Children read the number and drag and drop the amount of objects requested, then they click  "controlla". A smiley face appears if it is right and permits to go on. If a crying face appears, children must click on it and edit their work to go on.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Venn diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">quantity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
